Text: Ouch, this torrent got a little too much heat on it in Norwegian media...

The movie ("hacked" from pre-release) has been downloaded 300 times since yesterday from norbits.net (members only) in Norway. Many members are scared of the reaction from the police (IP tracking). 

Here is the story (in norwegian):
http://www.dagbladet.no/kultur/2006/08/21/474455.html
Norweagin users might want to stay away a bit.

afaik 
When you connect to a tracker you get the IP of your peers so you can track them that way. 
 probably some other fancy methods but what do I know. 

rumor has it they will be going after NorBits which is a Norweagin invite only bit torrent network. 

There has never been a large scale action in Norway against downloaders so It is probably no real risk for the base user population. 

The few times people in Norway have been "taken down" and sued / jailed etc it has been the origional person who uploaded the software/ media in hand.
ammagad, hvem er vel redde for å bli tatt for å laste ned noe fra PTB, denne kommer til å bli snatcha 10 tusen gang innen uka :P tror du noen tar deg?

For Quicktime Pro use these codes:

Pablo/nop
SMH2-6F4K-8SK9-ST5W-QKU3

just leave the codes in the text box.
